tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE running_database_performance_tuning (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  query_name VARCHAR(100),
  optimization_techniques TEXT,
  query_execution_time DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE query_execution (
  execution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  query_id INT,
  execution_time FLOAT,
  query_plan TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (query_id) REFERENCES performance_tuning(query_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_logs(
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_text TEXT,
    execution_time FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE query_statistics(
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_id INT,
    query_text TEXT,
    execution_time FLOAT,
    optimizer_stats JSON
)

CREATE TABLE index_usage(
    index_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR,
    index_name VARCHAR,
    last_used TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE query_plans(
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_id INT,
    plan_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE Index_Usage (
    index_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    index_name TEXT,
    table_name TEXT,
    index_type TEXT,
    last_usage_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Query_Optimization_Log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_id INT,
    optimization_steps TEXT,
    optimization_time FLOAT,
    optimization_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Hardware_Stats (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    storage_usage FLOAT,
    last_update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IO_Stats (
    io_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    io_type TEXT,
    io_duration FLOAT,
    io_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    query_id INT
);
